top_comment.author: André Rosin

comments.text:
+ZeroX7649 Well I guess it's the uncertain that keeps the mystery. Let's 
wait and see if any of our theories are right....
comments.author: André Rosin

comments.text:
Something tells me there's actually a method to his madness. Think about 
everything he's done so far. There doesn't seem like there's simply no 
purpose in any of it. He's tested to see if Chris was ready to train his 
powers, which he wasn't, if they went up against all those bugs on their 
own chances are they would've been pulverized or maybe they would've 
destroyed their race so he saved it and also gave himself hair, and here it 
looks like he was trying to send out some kind of message about Plum not 
being what she seems, later on had he not interfered and wasted their time 
they might've destroyed wankershim or prevented him from growing, and Chris 
needed to see partly into the future to be wary about Plum. Later we also 
seem Plum's true power, but ONLY after no one's around to see it. And ontop 
of that she lies about it. There's more to Plum than meets the eye and 
that's what I love about this series. You THINK its all just a random mess 
of things, but when you actually try to look at you realize all events up 
until now have served some greater purpose and the writers are really good 
at introducing us to things early and using very effective foreshadowing.
comments.author: ZeroX7649

captions.text: Meanwhile at the Bravest Warriors' Invisible Hideout!
Yeah! Wow! Woo! That was awesome! Wow, Wallow that teensy splash was legit!

He's just wearing his Hover Trunks. I
can make even teensier splashes my Hover Mustache.

Petite Diabetic Support Socks. Perfect
for the course or the clubhouse. Oh, Wallow is buyin me this right here.
Hello, uh you're Beth--you're the Beth's friend. Heh. Uh, Beth's friend.
I can't wait to get my Hover Car permit.
I thought you were old enough?
Hey Plum, if you're lucky I might teach you. I got my license.
I was born with my license! It's right here in my mouth! See?

[beep beep] I was just about to go for a spin right
now to the Dunes of Phobos! I could maybe show you my maneuvers.

Hey look over here, look at this!
[giggles]
Lord almighty. I knew you guys couldn't handle it if I brought Plum over.
[banjo]It's OK Beth, your buds are so funny!
I'm gonna go... eat the rest of that soft taco. It's gettin' cold.

Aaaaah! Impossibear has a gas powered stick!
Gas Powered Stick! Ooh! Never runs out of gas!
I think you've had enough of these chips.Thought you were watchin your waistline for me, baby.

Come on Plum, let's
go hang out in my room before we get pregnant.
Never runs out of gas! Pft. This is a jive-ass stick!
That's the most perfect peach ever. MWAH!
Whaa? Ah! Jive-ass peach pit! Whaaa?
My name is Catbug, what's yours!?
Holy Hardcore Hill Midgets, I have X-ray vision! I gotta tell Beth!

[sigh]
[music] I'm just a dude alone, outside

your door. But I could watch you shave your
pits a billion minutes more. And when my heart is full--
WHAT? What's happenin, girlfriend, uh ma'am...?

Plum. Remember me, from ten minutes ago?
So you're just chillin out, singing to the wall, huh?
Heh hey, why you all up in my jam all of a sudden?

Beth was right, you are interesting.
Hey Chris. Can I try something weird?

OK but I can see the windows. And that little
wooden seagull with the spinny wings.

Right, well it's not a secret hideout, exactly. It's
just invisible. Cloaked.
I just want to say I really liked smoochin on your face and such, but it's kind of...
So you want me to just give up, huh?

Not really. So listen, next time you come
over maybe we could--
[splash]

[music]
GAS POWERED STICK! NEVER RUNS OUT OF GAS!
Give us the biz in the comments.

title: Gas Powered Stick (Bravest Warriors - Ep. 7 Season 1 on Cartoon Hangover)
